means: 有知识者，受过高等教育的人，理论家

sentence.Network_en: That egghead published a new theory of matter last month.
sentence.Network_cn: 那位知识分子上个月发表了一个新的物质论.

sentence.Network_en: In spite of her love of reading she denied being an egghead.
sentence.Network_cn: 尽管她爱好阅读,但她不认为自己是个书呆子.

sentence.Network_en: You solved the problem in 5 minutes. You are a real egghead!
sentence.Network_cn: 你5分钟就解出这道题了, 真是聪明!

大学英语精... ... fuzzy-brained a. 头脑不清的 egghead n. 有知识者， 受过高等教育的人， 理论家 minority n. 少数(民族) ； 少数.
描绘人的形容词_好女laura吧_百度贴吧 ... Head over heels 彻底地 Egghead 知识分子 HAIR 头发.

list.abs: Sure , all the eggheads love Stevenson . But how many eggheads do you think there are ?, 当然罗 , 所有知识分子都喜欢史蒂文森 . 可是你想想 , 知识分子一共才有多少呀?
What do these eggheads know about practical things ?, 这些书呆子懂得什么实际的事务?
Zhou En comes not only it is great proletarian revolutionist , politician , militarist and diplomat , and it is crackajack Marxism egghead .周恩来不但是伟大的无产阶级革命家、政治家、军事家和外交家，而且是杰出的马克思主义理论家。
Qu Qiu Bai is a Chinese Communist one of inchoate and main leader , it is outstanding proletarian revolutionist and egghead .瞿秋白是中国共产党早期主要领导人之一，是卓越的无产阶级革命家和理论家。

derivation.yuyuan_name: by analogy with a bald head

entry.def: If you think someone is more interested in ideas and theories than in practical actions you can say they are an egghead .

example.ex: The Government was dominated by self-important eggheads.
example.tran: 政府被一群自以为是的书呆子控制着。

auth_sentence.content: I heard talk of egghead Professor Stephen Hawking turning up, but somehow that seems unlikely.
auth_sentence.res_content: I heard talk of egghead Professor Stephen Hawking turning up, but somehow that seems unlikely.

auth_sentence.content: But as a North West London Jew, Tory and think-tank egghead, I am hardly in need of extra pieces of identity.
